MaxAmpTotal: Maximum allowed sum of currents for complete system [A]
StateHomeSolarPower: object-id for currently available solar power [W]
StateHomeBatSoc: object-id for current home battery state of charge [%]
StateHomePowerConsumption: object-id for current home power consumption [W]
StateWallBox0ChargeCurrent: object-id for setting wallbox 0 charging current [A]
StateWallBox0ChargePower: object-id for reading wallbox 0 charging power [W]
StateWallBox0MeasuredMaxChargeAmp: object-id for reading measured max phase current of wallbox 0 [A]
StateWallBox1ChargeCurrent: object-id for setting wallbox 1 charging current [A]
StateWallBox1ChargePower: object-id for reading wallbox 1 charging power [W]
StateWallBox1MeasuredMaxChargeAmp: object-id for reading measured max phase current of wallbox 1 [A]
StateWallBox2ChargeCurrent: object-id for setting wallbox 2 charging current [A]
StateWallBox2ChargePower: object-id for reading wallbox 2 charging power [W]
StateWallBox2MeasuredMaxChargeAmp: object-id for reading measured max phase current of wallbox 2 [A]
